title: EA customer support is even shittier than Rito customer support

embed.description: Key code now invalid. Can't install via Origin. Origin doesn't recognize spore when I add the .exe to "my games" I really want the updates, since I still sometimes play it when I don't feel like playing League or messing with my Skyrim load order. Since apparently there's no email option in "conta...

body: There's no customer support email, and all the ONE person in there does is copy-paste a bunch of links on every single query.
